item.description:
After a long break, we are resuming our relaxation meetups at Art & Soul Yoga in Cambridge! 

http://www.artsoulyoga.com/Art_%26_Soul/Hom...

This first session will focus on Mindfulness. It is a practice that may help you increase awareness, manage stress, improve feelings of well-being, and increase resiliency.   

"Mindfulness is a way of learning to relate directly to whatever is happening in your life, a way of taking charge of your life, a way of doing something for yourself that no one else can do for you — consciously and systematically working with your own stress, pain, illness, and the challenges and demands of everyday life" (Center for Mindfulness)

http://www.umassmed.edu/cfm/stress/index.as...

Come join us for a drop-in session!
item.name: Mindful Awareness
